tool.name: tool_38

param.name: REPLACE
param.dialogReference:
Value to be replaced

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] value at mouse position

[1] fixed value

Default: 0

param.name: REPLACE_VALUE
param.dialogReference:
Fixed value to be replaced

Floating point

Default: 0.000000

Replace only this value with respect to the specified tolerance.

param.name: IGNORE_NODATA
param.dialogReference:
Ignore No-Data

Boolean

Default: 1

Do not fill areas representing no-data.

tool.summary: A flood fill algorithm will be used for replacement of grid cell values starting at the positions of the input points. If one or more points are selected, only these will be processed, otherwise all. If the target grid is not set, the changes will be applied to the original grid.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
